header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: Cannot find children Locations with ID %idList%
trans-unit.target: Untergeordnete Standorte mit der ID% idList% können nicht gefunden werden

trans-unit.source: No segments defined. Create Segments in the Admin panel to use this block.
trans-unit.target: Keine Segmente definiert. Erstellen Sie im Admin-Bereich Segmente, um diesen Block zu verwenden.
